channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 对美国比特币 ETF 的狂热正在严重打击为其铺平道路的多年老对手。
item.description:
The frenzy for US Bitcoin ETFs is taking a heavy toll on years-old rivals that had paved their way. https://t.co/YnmlEUVSAc

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 英国和印度暂停了期待已久的贸易协议谈判，直至印度大选之后
item.description:
The UK and India have paused talks on a long-awaited trade deal until after India’s elections https://t.co/f3oXNJcn0S

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 大麻生产商 Ascend Wellness 已向私人信贷公司寻求新的贷款，以便为其未偿债务再融资。
item.description:
Cannabis producer Ascend Wellness has reached out to private credit firms for a new loan that will refinance its outstanding debt. https://t.co/Ip7ri9K44S

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 法国央行行长弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）表示，法国的通货膨胀率距离欧洲央行 2% 的目标并不遥远
item.description:
Inflation in France is not far from the ECB’s 2% target, Bank of France Governor Francois Villeroy de Galhau said https://t.co/pFEVofvOOx

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 弗拉基米尔-普京（Vladimir Putin）在俄罗斯总统选举中进行了在线投票，这将使他获得第五个执政任期，延长他近四分之一世纪的统治。
item.description:
Vladimir Putin voted online in Russia’s presidential election that’s set to give him a fifth term in power to extend his almost quarter-century rule https://t.co/nwWemgMECJ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 检察官说，山姆-班克曼-弗里德（Sam Bankman-Fried）在他的 FTX 加密货币交易所倒闭事件中扮演了重要角色，"这很可能是过去十年中最大的一起欺诈案"，因此他应该被判处多达 50 年的监禁。
item.description:
Prosecutors said Sam Bankman-Fried should get as much as 50 years behind bars for his role in the collapse of his FTX cryptocurrency exchange in “what is likely the largest fraud of the last decade.” https://t.co/e7CKpkgxF8

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 一位共和党国会议员要求财政部解释其对一家美国保险公司的处理方式，该公司承保了数十艘涉嫌运送受制裁伊朗石油的油轮。
item.description:
A Republican congressman is asking the Treasury Department to explain its handling of a US insurance company that covered dozens of tanker ships suspected of carrying sanctioned Iranian oil. https://t.co/E7Dz0JZ8KJ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 在美国前财政部长史蒂文-姆努钦（Steven Mnuchin）领导的一群投资者介入注资之前，纽约社区银行（New York Community Bancorp）的市值下跌了约三分之二。下面我们来看看发生了什么。
item.description:
New York Community Bancorp’s market value fell by about two-thirds before a group of investors led by former US Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin stepped in to inject capital. Here’s a look at what happened. https://t.co/m7XYyKnyYl

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 在原油价格不断上涨的背景下，页岩勘探者的热情再次高涨，石油钻探活动达到了半年来的最高水平。
item.description:
Shale explorers are heating up again, boosting oil drilling activity to the highest level in half a year amid rising crude prices. https://t.co/zZwzrknEYg

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 有一项指标显示，州和地方政府债券收益率与国债相比已下滑至近三年来的最低水平。
item.description:
By one measure, state and local government bond yields have slid to the lowest levels against Treasuries in nearly three years. https://t.co/Q1YuUstUfB

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 由于燃料价格波动和波音公司的麻烦不断，美国航空业正面临自10月份以来最严重的两周连跌。
item.description:
US airline stocks are heading for the worst two-week losing streak since October as volatile fuel prices and the mounting troubles at Boeing tear through the industry. https://t.co/ydKguxlT68

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 亿万富翁艾伦-霍华德（Alan Howard）共同创办的对冲基金 Brevan Howard 正在裁减约二十多名交易员，约占员工总数的 10%。
item.description:
Brevan Howard, the hedge fund co-founded by billionaire Alan Howard, is cutting about two dozen traders, or about 10% of the total staff. https://t.co/2ruaJuNhA6

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 他告诉《彭博新闻社》，弗雷迪-西泽计划在休整一段时间后，于今年晚些时候开始为新企业筹集资金，目标是在 2025 年启动该企业。
item.description:
Freddie Sizer plans to start fund-raising for the new venture later this year after a break, with the aim of launching it in 2025, he told Bloomberg News https://t.co/2GMEi9V1pz

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 安德森-霍洛维茨（Andreessen Horowitz）和豪恩风投（Haun Ventures）等公司都在关注加密货币，因为比特币价格创下历史新高，初创企业又有了新的融资交易，这预示着加密货币行业将卷土重来。
item.description:
Firms including Andreessen Horowitz and Haun Ventures are all in on crypto as the industry celebrates a comeback heralded by a new all-time high for the price of Bitcoin and fresh funding deals for startups. https://t.co/7Sgp1Mtx5V

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 阿根廷卡塔马卡省表示，法院关于停止颁发锂许可证的裁决仅影响新项目，Arcadium Lithium 和 Posco 等公司仍可继续生产这种金属。
item.description:
The Argentine province of Catamarca said a court ruling to halt the awarding of lithium permits only affects new projects, leaving companies such as Arcadium Lithium and Posco free to continue producing the metal https://t.co/8MZFYzueKA

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 美国房地产市场库存增加，尤其是在南部地区，越来越多的卖家降低了要价
item.description:
The US housing market is seeing more inventory, especially in the South, and an increasing number of sellers are lowering their asking prices https://t.co/4w3dMetwFh

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 德国和法国同意联手开始在乌克兰境内生产武器，以加强对基辅的军事装备支持
item.description:
Germany and France agree to join forces to start producing weapons inside Ukraine, in a bid to boost military equipment support for Kyiv https://t.co/hJjeKfxv3X

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 对去年石油市场动荡负有重大责任的算法资金经理们，将把汽油的红火涨势推向新的高点
item.description:
The algorithmic money managers responsible for so much of oil’s turbulence last year are set to push gasoline’s red-hot rally to new highs https://t.co/BBS5q9uJdi

item.title: 普京几乎肯定会在本周末再次赢得总统任期，而此时乌克兰的战局正朝着对他有利的方向发展
item.description:
Putin is all but certain to win another term as president this weekend just as the war in Ukraine turns in his favor https://t.co/w6cZiwobC9

item.title: memecoin "亿万富翁 "又回来了。华尔街的长期居民们不禁要问：为什么？为什么？
item.description:
The memecoin “billionaires” are back. And it’s left longtime denizens of Wall Street asking: Why? How? https://t.co/jtRhSwyddL

item.title: 危地马拉新任领导人在华盛顿的帮助下击败了一个由 "恶势力 "组成的强大联盟，该联盟阴谋阻止他上台，在此之后，危地马拉正在寻求数十亿美元的美国投资。
item.description:
Guatemala’s new leader is seeking billions of dollars in US investment after Washington helped him defeat a powerful alliance of “malign actors” who schemed to keep him out of office. https://t.co/1ixOwyaDWB

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 巴克莱银行（Barclays）上调了对美国新抵押贷款债务发行量的预期，因为这种债务的销售创下了至少十年来最快的开局。
item.description:
Barclays is upping its projection for new US collateralized loan obligation issuance as sales of the debt track the fastest start to any year in at least a decade https://t.co/NE8Y2JnG26

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024
